location: Fuxing South Road Section 1, near Zhongxiao Fuxing MRT (60m)
notes: 2BR/2BA apartment on 6F/14F with elevator and security guard. All rooms have windows suggesting good natural light. Furnished with essential appliances. No cooking allowed which is a significant limitation for a family with a baby. No pets policy. Balcony present - would need to verify railing safety for child. Prime location near MRT station.
